long_description: The Shimano SLX FC-M670 10-speed triple crankset offers a stiff, rugged design that will meet the challenges of demanding trail riding so you can shred in confidence season after season. Tough aluminum crank arms drive an aluminum outer ring, composite-reinforced steel middle ring and an all-steel inner ring to withstand hard use on the trails. Chainrings feature ramps and pins for improved shifting precision. Rigid yet lightweight Hollowtech II spindle design delivers efficient power transfer. The SLX FC-M670 10-speed crankset is part of the Dyna-Sys group of components from Shimano and is compatible with other Dyna-Sys parts; for use with HG-X 10-speed drivetrains. Compatible with both 68/73mm bottom bracket shells (spacers included); 175mm crank arms.
short_description: The Shimano SLX FC-M670 10-speed triple crankset offers a stiff, rugged design that will meet the challenges of demanding trail riding so you can shred in confidence season after season.
